original: @##/_/dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi🔽ba'i sgrub thabs/ khye
analyzed: @##/_/dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/ khye
translated: The Sādhana of Śāntika Śrī-Gaṇapati

original: / @/_tshhogs bdag dkar po'i sgrub thabs man ngag cha lag dang bcas pa bzhugs so//🔽@@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri ga na pa ti shan ta na sa d+ha na ma/_bod skad

translated: The Sādhana of White Gaṇapati with the Auxiliary Instructions🔽In Sanskrit: Śrī-gaṇapati-śānti-sādhana

original: du/_dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/_'jig rten dbang phyug
analyzed: du/_dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/_'jig rten dbang phyug
translated: In Tibetan: Dpal tshogs kyi bdag po zhi ba’i sgrub thabs🔽Homage to Lokeśvara Avalokiteśvara.

original: spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por gnas dben zhing yid du 'ong
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por gnas dben zhing yid du 'ong
translated: First, in a solitary and pleasing place,🔽smear the four-cornered maṇḍala with the five cow products.

original: bar/_man+dal gru bzhi pa ba yi rnam lngas byug go/_/sman dang dri zhim po'i chus
analyzed: bar/_man+dal gru bzhi pa ba yi rnam lngas byug go/_/sman dang dri zhim po'i chus
translated: Sprinkle it with medicine and fragrant water,🔽make a drop of white sandalwood scent,

original: chag chag gdab/_tshan+dan dkar po'i dri'i thig le gcig bya/_me tog dkar
analyzed: chag chag gdab/_tshan+dan dkar po'i dri'i thig le gcig bya/_me tog dkar
translated: arrange a white flower bouquet,

original: po'i tshhom bu gcig dgod/_mar me dang dri dang spos dang lha bshos dgram/
analyzed: po'i tshhom bu gcig dgod/_mar me dang dri dang spos dang lha bshos dgram/
translated: and set out lamps, scent, incense, and food offerings.

original: gtor ma chan nam bag bye la sbrus pa'i zan dkar gsum mngar gsum/_la
analyzed: gtor ma chan nam bag bye la sbrus pa'i zan dkar gsum mngar gsum/_la
translated: For the bali offering, use either cooked rice or white flour dough mixed with the three whites and the three sweets,

original: phug re re/_la du'i ri lu re re gzhug_/lugs sku'am bris sku yod na🔽bzhugs su gsol/_de ltar bsham de nas dang po dkon mchog gsum la mchod
analyzed: phug re re/_la du'i ri lu re re gzhug_/lugs sku'am bris sku yod na bzhugs su gsol/_de ltar bsham de nas dang po dkon mchog gsum la mchod
translated: If you have a bronze or painted image of Jambhala,🔽place it in the center.🔽After setting up the shrine in this way, first make offerings to the Three Jewels,

original: pa phul la/_bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed/_de nas mdun du a las zla ba'i🔽dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: pa phul la/_bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed/_de nas mdun du a las zla ba'i dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs
translated: and generate yourself as the yidam deity.🔽Then, in front of you, visualize a white syllable hūṃ

original: steng du yi ge hum dkar po gcig bsam/_de las dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po sku
analyzed: steng du yi ge hum dkar po gcig bsam/_de las dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po sku
translated: on a moon maṇḍala arisen from a.🔽From that, imagine that glorious Gaṇapati

original: mdog dkar po glang po che'i mgo can phyag g.yas gnyis na/_la phug dang dgra
analyzed: mdog dkar po glang po che'i mgo can phyag g.yas gnyis na/_la phug dang dgra
translated: has a white-colored body with an elephant head. In his two right hands he holds a radish and a sword,

original: sta bsnams pa/_g.yon gnyis na thod pa nor bus bkang ba dang /_kha tram kha
analyzed: sta bsnams pa/_g.yon gnyis na thod pa nor bus bkang ba dang /_kha tram kha
translated: and in his two left hands he holds a skull-cup filled with jewels and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: snams pa/_rin po che dang lha'i me tog gis brgyan pa/_byi ba sngon po'i khri la🔽bzhugs pa gcig gsal bar sgom/_de nas bdag nyid kyi thugs kha nas/
analyzed: snams pa/_rin po che dang lha'i me tog gis brgyan pa/_byi ba sngon po'i khri la bzhugs pa gcig gsal bar sgom/_de nas bdag nyid kyi thugs kha nas/
translated: He is adorned with jewels and divine flowers and sits upon a throne of blue mice.🔽Meditate clearly on him.🔽Then, light rays radiate from one’s heart center

original: 'od zer 'phros pas/_rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dpal tshhogs bdag spyan
analyzed: 'od zer 'phros pas/_rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dpal tshhogs bdag spyan
translated: and invite glorious Gaṇapati from his natural abode.

original: drangs la/_mdun gyi de la bstims _/_dam tshhig gi phyag rgya bstan/_sku
analyzed: drangs la/_mdun gyi de la bstims _/_dam tshhig gi phyag rgya bstan/_sku
translated: Display the pledge seal and confer the empowerment.

original: khrus gsol/_mchod pa sngags kyis dbul/
analyzed: khrus gsol/_mchod pa sngags kyis dbul/
translated: Bathe the form and make offerings with the mantras.

original: de nas zlas pa bya ba ni/_om ba ra ta ka swa ha zhi ba/_om ba ga ba te e ka
analyzed: de nas zlas pa bya ba ni/_om ba ra ta ka swa ha zhi ba/_om ba ga ba te e ka
translated: Next, the recitation is as follows: Oṃ varaṭaka svāhā is for pacification. Oṃ bhagavat ekadvibin-

original: d-itha bin d+ha sid+hi hum rgyas pa/_om bye ga na pa ti ye swa ha dbang /_zhi ba'i yi ge 'bru
analyzed: d-itha bin d+ha sid+hi hum rgyas pa/_om bye ga na pa ti ye swa ha dbang /_zhi ba'i yi ge 'bru
translated: dhasiddhi hūṃ is for increase. Oṃ bhagavān pāṇḍaravāsiniye svāhā is for power.🔽The seven syllables of pacification.

original: bdun pa/_'bum phrag gcig zlas pa byas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
analyzed: bdun pa/_'bum phrag gcig zlas pa byas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
translated: If one recites one hundred thousand times, whatever siddhi one🔽wishes for will be accomplished.

original: kyang gter/_bsams pa yang 'grub longs spyod che/_yo byad kyang 'phel bar
analyzed: kyang gter/_bsams pa yang 'grub longs spyod che/_yo byad kyang 'phel bar
translated: Wealth and possessions will increase.🔽All the wealth of the three realms will come, and one will become

original: 'gyur ro/_/khams gsum gyi nor thams cad 'ong ste phyug por 'gyur ro/_/nye
analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/khams gsum gyi nor thams cad 'ong ste phyug por 'gyur ro/_/nye
translated: wealthy.

original: ba'i snying po b+ha ga ba te zla ba drug mchod pa dang zlas pa byas na mi tha mal pa yang stong
analyzed: ba'i snying po b+ha ga ba te zla ba drug mchod pa dang zlas pa byas na mi tha mal pa yang stong
translated: If one performs the near essence, the bhagavat, for six months with🔽offerings and recitation, even an ordinary person will become equal

original: 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/ming
analyzed: 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/ming
translated: in merit to a cakravartin king.

original: gi snying po ga na pa ti zla ba drug tu zlas pa dang mchod pa byas na/_rgyal po dang blon
analyzed: gi snying po ga na pa ti zla ba drug tu zlas pa dang mchod pa byas na/_rgyal po dang blon
translated: If one recites and makes offerings to the essence mantra of the heart of the🔽vajra master for six months, one will be able to enthrall kings and ministers.🔽

original: po dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang
analyzed: po dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang
translated: If you recite the essence mantra of Gaṇapati and make offerings to him for six months, all kings, ministers, men, women, and so forth will come under your control.

original: du 'gyur ro/ zlas pa thon nas/_dkar gtor la sngags btab ste dbul bar bya'o/_/
analyzed: du 'gyur ro/ zlas pa thon nas/_dkar gtor la sngags btab ste dbul bar bya'o/_/
translated: When you have finished reciting the mantra, recite it over a white torma and offer it.

original: dam tshhig ni chos la gnas par bya dgos so/_/gtor ma ni khams las kha zas
analyzed: dam tshhig ni chos la gnas par bya dgos so/_/gtor ma ni khams las kha zas
translated: The samaya is that you must abide by the Dharma. The torma is food🔽with a hundred flavors, which you imagine filling the sky.

original: ro brgya pa/_nam mkha' khengs par sgom mo/_/de la gsol bar bsam mo/_/🔽phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan tshhogs bdag dgyes/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan zhi
analyzed: ro brgya pa/_nam mkha' khengs par sgom mo/_/de la gsol bar bsam mo/_/ phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan tshhogs bdag dgyes/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan zhi
translated: Think that he is partaking of it.🔽Homage to the glorious lord of the gaṇas,🔽homage to the glorious great peaceful one,🔽homage to the glorious great wrathful one.

original: ba che/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan khro bo che/_/tshhe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni/_/
analyzed: ba che/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan khro bo che/_/tshhe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni/_/
translated: In this very life, seek🔽whatever spiritual powers you desire.

original: ci 'dod pa ni bstshol bar mdzod/_/lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni/_/bsgrub
analyzed: ci 'dod pa ni bstshol bar mdzod/_/lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni/_/bsgrub
translated: The power of the king of gods🔽is sought by the practitioner.

original: pa po la bstshol bar mdzod/_/shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid las/_/tshhogs
analyzed: pa po la bstshol bar mdzod/_/shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid las/_/tshhogs
translated: From the one who is the embodiment of great compassion,🔽the gaṇas

original: bdag chen po thugs rje che/_/thugs rje chen pos dbul ba bskyob/_/nor lha
analyzed: bdag chen po thugs rje che/_/thugs rje chen pos dbul ba bskyob/_/nor lha
translated: Great being, great compassion,🔽with great compassion you protect the poor.🔽To you, great wealth god,

original: chen po khyod nyid la/_/bdag nyid dang bas phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/dpal ldan
analyzed: chen po khyod nyid la/_/bdag nyid dang bas phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/dpal ldan
translated: I offer homage and praise with devotion.🔽The glorious great Gaṇeśa🔽has a white body and an elephant head.

original: tshhogs bdag chen po ni/_/sku mdog dkar po glang chen dbu/_/g.yas kyi phyag
analyzed: tshhogs bdag chen po ni/_/sku mdog dkar po glang chen dbu/_/g.yas kyi phyag
translated: In his right hand🔽he holds an axe, in his left a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: na la phug bsnams/_/g.yon na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams/_/'og ma dgra sta
analyzed: na la phug bsnams/_/g.yon na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams/_/'og ma dgra sta
translated: The lower hands hold a sword

original: kha tram ka_/gsus chen rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan/_/zla ba byi ba'i khri la
analyzed: kha tram ka_/gsus chen rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan/_/zla ba byi ba'i khri la
translated: and a khaṭvāṅga, and he is adorned with all the ornaments.🔽He sits on a moon-rat throne.

original: bzhugs/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan tshhogs bdag la'o/_/la phug gtor ma
analyzed: bzhugs/_/phyag 'tshhal dpal ldan tshhogs bdag la'o/_/la phug gtor ma
translated: I offer homage to the glorious Gaṇeśa.🔽Accept this garlic torma🔽and increase my wealth and enjoyments.

original: 'di bzhes la/_/tshhe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_/nad dang 'byung po zhi
analyzed: 'di bzhes la/_/tshhe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_/nad dang 'byung po zhi
translated: Pacify sickness and bhūta spirits.🔽May humans, gods, nāgas, and yakṣas

original: bar mdzod/_/mi dang lha klu gnod sbyin rnams/_/bdag gi bran du 'gyur bar
analyzed: bar mdzod/_/mi dang lha klu gnod sbyin rnams/_/bdag gi bran du 'gyur bar
translated: become my servants.

original: shog_/lha'i longs spyod mang po las/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung bar shog_/
analyzed: shog_/lha'i longs spyod mang po las/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung bar shog_/
translated: From many divine enjoyments, may the sense pleasures arise.

original: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang phyug can/_/gdul bya'i dbang gi sku sprul pa/_/lha
analyzed: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang phyug can/_/gdul bya'i dbang gi sku sprul pa/_/lha
translated: You are the lord of the accomplishment of siddhis,🔽You emanate bodies according to the needs of those to be tamed,🔽Great lord of the great hosts of gods,

original: chen tshhogs bdag chen po yis/_/'jig rten 'dir yang bsrung zhing dngos grub
analyzed: chen tshhogs bdag chen po yis/_/'jig rten 'dir yang bsrung zhing dngos grub
translated: Protect this world and grant me siddhi,

original: stshol/_/phyi ma byang chub thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig_/
analyzed: stshol/_/phyi ma byang chub thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig_/
translated: And be a friend in attaining enlightenment in the future.

original: zlas pa thon khar gtor ma sngags kyis btab te dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas🔽ye shes sems dpa' gshegs/_dam tshhig pa sdus la spyod lam bya'o/_/bsdus pa la
analyzed: zlas pa thon khar gtor ma sngags kyis btab te dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs/_dam tshhig pa sdus la spyod lam bya'o/_/bsdus pa la
translated: At the end of the recitation, offer a torma that has been blessed with the mantra.🔽Then the wisdom being departs and the commitment being dissolves.

original: dga' ba'i gang zag la bstan pa'o/_/'di jo bos dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la
analyzed: dga' ba'i gang zag la bstan pa'o/_/'di jo bos dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la
translated: This is taught for those who delight in the concise.🔽This was composed by Atisha based on the Tantra of the Source of Siddhis.

original: rten nas mdzad pa'o/_/des 'brom/_des spyan snga ba la gnang ba'o//
analyzed: rten nas mdzad pa'o/_/des 'brom/_des spyan snga ba la gnang ba'o//
translated: He taught it to Drom, and Drom taught it to Chengawa.

original: dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: dpal tshhogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/
translated: The Sādhana of Śāntika Śrī Gaṇeśa
